exec: pm.test("连接测试响应格式正确", function () {

request.description: Netmiko基础连接测试 - 验证SSH连接和认证

item.name: Netmiko连接测试 - 完整参数

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}",
    "port": 22,
    "timeout": 60,
    "keepalive": 30,
    "global_delay_factor": 2,
    "fast_cli": false,
    "verbose": true
  }
}

request.description: Netmiko完整参数连接测试 - 包含所有常用连接参数

item.name: Netmiko Driver - Query
单命令查询

request.description: 最简单的单命令查询 - 不使用任何高级参数
使用FIFO队列策略的基础查询
使用设备绑定队列策略的基础查询 - 连接复用

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "timeout": 120,
    "global_delay_factor": 3
  },
  "command": "show running-config",
  "driver_args": {
    "read_timeout": 120,
    "delay_factor": 4,
    "max_loops": 1000,
    "auto_find_prompt": true,
    "strip_prompt": true,
    "cmd_verify": false
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600
}

request.description: 针对慢速设备或大量输出的优化配置

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "timeout": 60,
    "keepalive": 30
  },
  "command": "dis cu",
  "driver_args": {
    "read_timeout": 60,
    "delay_factor": 2,
    "max_loops": 1000,
    "auto_find_prompt": true,
    "strip_prompt": true,
    "strip_command": true,
    "normalize": true,
    "cmd_verify": false
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600
}

item.description: Netmiko单命令查询的各种参数组合

item.name: 多命令查询

request.description: 基础多命令查询 - 设备基本信息收集

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "timeout": 90,
    "keepalive": 60
  },
  "command": [
    "show version",
    "show ip interface brief",
    "show vlan brief",
    "show spanning-tree summary",
    "show mac address-table count",
    "show processes cpu",
    "show memory statistics"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "read_timeout": 45,
    "delay_factor": 1.5,
    "auto_find_prompt": true,
    "strip_prompt": true,
    "strip_command": true,
    "normalize": true,
    "cmd_verify": true
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600
}

request.description: 优化的多命令查询 - 完整设备状态收集

item.name: 多命令 - 网络诊断组合

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}"
  },
  "command": [
    "show ip route summary",
    "show ip arp",
    "show cdp neighbors detail",
    "show lldp neighbors detail",
    "show interface counters errors",
    "show logging | include ERROR|WARN"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "read_timeout": 60,
    "delay_factor": 2,
    "strip_prompt": true,
    "normalize": true
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 450
}

item.name: Netmiko Driver - Configuration
单配置推送

request.description: 最简单的单配置推送 - 修改主机名
带driver_args的基础配置 - 错误检测和模式控制

item.description: 单配置命令推送的各种方式

item.name: 多配置推送

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}"
  },
  "config": [
    "interface GigabitEthernet0/1",
    "description Server Connection",
    "switchport mode access",
    "switchport access vlan 100",
    "no shutdown"
  ],
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 300
}

request.description: 基础接口配置 - 单个接口设置

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}"
  },
  "config": [
    "interface range GigabitEthernet0/1-10",
    "description User Ports",
    "switchport mode access",
    "switchport access vlan 200",
    "spanning-tree portfast",
    "spanning-tree bpduguard enable",
    "no shutdown"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "exit_config_mode": true,
    "enter_config_mode": true,
    "cmd_verify": true,
    "delay_factor": 2,
    "read_timeout": 60,
    "error_pattern": "% Invalid|% Error|% Bad"
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600
}

request.description: 批量接口配置 - 范围配置和安全特性

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}"
  },
  "config": [
    "interface range GigabitEthernet0/1-10",
    "description Batch Configuration by NetPulse",
    "switchport mode access",
    "switchport access vlan 200",
    "spanning-tree portfast",
    "no shutdown"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "exit_config_mode": true,
    "config_mode_command": "configure terminal",
    "enter_config_mode": true,
    "cmd_verify": true,
    "delay_factor": 2,
    "read_timeout": 60,
    "error_pattern": "% Invalid|% Error|% Bad",
    "terminator": "#",
    "strip_prompt": false,
    "strip_command": false
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600,
  "webhook": {
    "url": "https://config-mgmt.company.com/callback",
    "method": "POST"
  }
}

request.description: 高级配置推送，包含driver_args配置和webhook回调

item.name: 系统配置 - 完整设置

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}"
  },
  "config": [
    "ntp server 8.8.8.8",
    "ntp server 8.8.4.4",
    "logging host 192.168.1.100",
    "logging trap informational",
    "snmp-server community public RO",
    "snmp-server location Datacenter-Rack01",
    "snmp-server contact admin@company.com",
    "ip domain-name company.local",
    "clock timezone EST -5",
    "service timestamps log datetime msec"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "exit_config_mode": true,
    "enter_config_mode": true,
    "cmd_verify": true,
    "delay_factor": 1,
    "read_timeout": 45,
    "error_pattern": "% Invalid|% Error",
    "strip_prompt": false,
    "strip_command": false
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600,
  "webhook": {
    "url": "https://config-mgmt.company.com/device-config",
    "method": "POST",
    "headers": {
      "Authorization": "Bearer {{config_token}}"
    }
  }
}

request.description: 系统级配置推送 - NTP、日志、SNMP等基础设施

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "secret": "{{enable_password}}"
  },
  "config": [
    "ip access-list extended MANAGEMENT_ACCESS",
    "permit tcp 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255 any eq 22",
    "permit tcp 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255 any eq 443",
    "permit icmp 192.168.1.0 0.0.0.255 any",
    "deny ip any any log",
    "exit",
    "line vty 0 4",
    "access-class MANAGEMENT_ACCESS in",
    "transport input ssh",
    "exit",
    "ip ssh version 2",
    "ip ssh time-out 60",
    "ip ssh authentication-retries 3"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "exit_config_mode": true,
    "enter_config_mode": true,
    "cmd_verify": true,
    "delay_factor": 2,
    "read_timeout": 60,
    "error_pattern": "% Invalid|% Error|% Incomplete"
  },
  "queue_strategy": "pinned",
  "ttl": 600
}

request.description: PyEAPI基础配置推送 - 单命令配置

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "pyeapi",
  "connection_args": {
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "transport": "https",
    "port": 443
  },
  "config": [
    "vlan 100",
    "name DATA_VLAN",
    "vlan 200",
    "name VOICE_VLAN",
    "vlan 300",
    "name GUEST_VLAN",
    "interface range Ethernet1-10",
    "switchport mode access",
    "switchport access vlan 100"
  ],
  "driver_args": {
    "format": "text",
    "autoComplete": true,
    "expandAliases": true
  },
  "queue_strategy": "fifo",
  "ttl": 600
}

item.name: Template Operations
模板渲染 (Rendering)

request.description: Jinja2基础模板渲染
Jinja2复杂循环模板 - 批量VLAN和接口配置
通过路径参数指定模板类型

item.description: 各种模板引擎的渲染功能

item.name: 模板解析 (Parsing)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "textfsm",
  "template": "Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value IP ([\d\.]+)
Value STATUS (up|down|administratively down)

Start
  ^${INTERFACE}\s+${IP}\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+${STATUS} -> Record",
  "context": "GigabitEthernet0/1    192.168.1.1     YES manual up                    up
GigabitEthernet0/2    192.168.1.2     YES manual down                  down
GigabitEthernet0/3    unassigned      YES unset  administratively down down"
}

request.description: TextFSM解析接口状态信息

body.raw:
{
  "name": "textfsm",
  "template": "Value NETWORK ([\d\.]+/\d+)
Value NEXTHOP ([\d\.]+)
Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value PROTOCOL (\w+)

Start
  ^${PROTOCOL}\s+${NETWORK}\s+\[\d+/\d+\]\s+via\s+${NEXTHOP},\s+\S+,\s+${INTERFACE} -> Record",
  "context": "O        10.1.1.0/24 [110/2] via 192.168.1.1, 00:05:00, GigabitEthernet0/1
O        10.2.2.0/24 [110/3] via 192.168.1.2, 00:03:00, GigabitEthernet0/2
C        192.168.1.0/24 is directly connected, GigabitEthernet0/0"
}

request.description: TextFSM解析路由表信息
TTP解析设备配置信息

body.raw:
{
  "template": "Value INTERFACE (\S+)
Value IP ([\d\.]+)
Value STATUS (up|down|administratively down)

Start
  ^${INTERFACE}\s+${IP}\s+\w+\s+\w+\s+${STATUS} -> Record",
  "context": "GigabitEthernet0/1    192.168.1.1     YES manual up                    up
GigabitEthernet0/2    192.168.1.2     YES manual down                  down
GigabitEthernet0/3    unassigned      YES unset  administratively down down"
}

request.description: 通过路径参数指定解析器类型

body.raw:
{
  "driver": "netmiko",
  "connection_args": {
    "device_type": "{{device_type}}",
    "host": "{{device_host}}",
    "username": "{{device_username}}",
    "password": "{{device_password}}",
    "timeout": 120
  },
  "command": [
    "show version",
    "show inventory",
    "show interfaces",
    "show ip interface brief",
    "show vlan brief",
    "show running-config | include hostname|ntp|logging|snmp",
    "show users",
    "show processes cpu",
    "show memory statistics"

      "Content-Type": "application/json"

  "queue_strategy": "pinned",

}
